title: Build an app for android and iPhone -- 2
desc: Dear developer,We are seeking an innovative developer that can help us create a flash card application for doctors that will run on both iOS and Android. The aim of the app is to help the user memorise information in an efficient manner. We particularly like the recall system used by Ankiweb ([url removed, login to view]). The app will also give feedback to the user on their performance over time. Although this is a very brief summary of what we want to achieve, the specifics will be discussed with suitable developers.We are seeking someone who is professional with a good grasp of English. We will also offer up to 10% bonus for timely work, enthusiasm and energy.I would like to set a one week deadline for completion of task so ideally would like to work with someone focused on just my project.Thank you for taking time to read this post and look forward to hearing from you.Kind RegardsDetails of proposal:Flash card for GP doctorsThe app needs to be colourful and friendly. I particularly like the feel created by tinder.Purpose.To help doctors learn new facts and then retain information into the longterm memory. I would like to have both premium and free service (please see below)For the users1) A question would appear on front of card.There will be a timer in the top right corner (count down from 1 min)2) By clicking on the card or if the timer runs out, the card will flip over and reveal the answer.3) Then similar to tinder, if the user felt they answered correctly, they swipe right, if they got the question wrong they swipe left.If user gets question wrong, the question will be reshown to them in 10 minutes.If they get the question right, the card will be reshown in one day time. If they get the question right in a day time, it will show again n 2 days time. If they get it right in 2 days time, it will show again in 4 days time, if they get it right in 4 days time it will show again in 8 days time and so on. However, if they get the question wrong at any point and they swipe left, it will reset and go back to 10 minutes.I want to be able to have premium and free users. Free users can upgrade at any point. The free users will be able to see a limited number of cards a day (which I will be able to set. The free users will also see adverts after a set number of cards played.  The premium users will not be shown any adverts and there will be no limit to how many cards they can see each day.The premium users will also be able to create their own cards by clicking an icon on the bottom of the screen, this will allow them to personalise their deck of cards; for example if they come across new information from clinical practice, they can simply create a new card and keep storage of this new information.Each card will have a coloured icon related to the specialty it is related to. For example if it a cardiology question, there will be a red heart in the top left.If it is a respiratory question, it will have a blue lung in the left corner. This should appear in a circular tag.Premium users will be able to select which specialty they would like to revise from their user preference area.In the user preference area,User can decide which specialty they want to revise (can be multiple)They can also set an exam time, from this date – the programme will indicate how many cards must be seen each day.For me to be able to write the cards to be seen on the app:I need a front sheet . I will be able to type in information or paste a picture.The card that will be revealed will either show text or pictureThere will be no limit how long the cards will be.When I am creating the card, I will be able to tag the question to type of specialty.

title: Rock Paper Scissors IOS Game Application
desc: I would like to create an iOS application where players are able to play against each other in a multiplayer platform in Rock Paper Scissors online with CASH prizes.Important:> This is not going to be a gambling application. Users will not have to risk anything of value as the game is 100% free to enter with the chance of winning the CASH prizes through skill rather than luck.> The most important aspect of this application is that it runs smoothly without any lag as well as ensuring users that this is a SAFE, FREE, NON-GAMBLING APPLICATION where they can win PRIZE MONEY.Concept tournament:> This would be a multiplayer game, with a game format similar to Wimbledon Tennis Knockout Tournament.> This will be a tournament of best of 3 Sets. (1 set will be awarded to the player who first reaches 3 wins against their opponent). If it is 1-1 (1 set each) the first player to win the next set will eliminate their opponent.> When you win, you advance and play the next opponent until you reach the last opponent standing.> Winner has prize money of $X deposited into their Paypal account or can take the money in 'virtual in game currency' to put towards in game features such as 'skins' etc.IMPORTANT :>The tournament initially will be once a day 5 days a week (subject to change) at a specific time. However, the tournament will only commence once a certain number of players enter the tournament. Once the desired number is reached the tournament will commence (no one will be able to enter the tournament once it has begun)Concept free play:> We want this game to also be available to be played outside that of the tournaments every day.> We want users to be able to still play others online, where there will be challenges to complete and virtual coins to obtain.> When players complete challenges they have a chance of winning 1 treasure box token or virtual coins.> Also play the computer if possible.Concept artwork:>We are happy to provide some sketches for how we would like the application to look.> The first screen will be where people sign up and create 'accounts' which stores their username and saves their Paypal email ID in case they win the tournament. (Users must be explained thoroughly that this is free and their Paypal ID will only be used to deposit the Cash prizes if they win a tournament.) The USER must feel that this application is SAFE.>We want the games to be played in arenas, where there is a table in the middle where there will be two HANDS on either side of the table.> We want the Hand to be able to perform the function of "Scissors" "Rock" (Clinched hand) "Paper" (Flat hand)Monetisation/in-app ideas> IOS Ads in app at bottom or top (ads similar to clash of clans and other such apps etc..)> Video adds to watch to obtain virtual coins.> In app purchases for skins (We want Users to be able to purchase virtual coins to obtain enough coins to buy Skins for their "hand" which can be showcased online against other opponents.> We also want their to be a treasure box that will cost a certain amount of coins (still obtainable through playing online and winning or completing challenges without purchasing coins.) This treasure box will provide the User with a random Skin that will either be ("RARE" "Legendary" "Epic" or "INSANE".)Multiplayer game functionality:> [url removed, login to view]> [url removed, login to view]Games where money is earned on iphone apps> Raffler (watch ads and prize money is given away) [url removed, login to view]> Raffal**ARTWORK AND DESIGNS TO BE INCLUDED IN THE QUOTE**

title: Make Changes to 3d Model
desc: Hi,I am making a roulette game for Android and IOS in Unity. I have 2 roulette tables- American Roulette and European Roulette. These two roulette tables have two different roulette wheels. The problem I am having is that in my game after landing on a certain number in the roulette wheels the ball moves to the next number after landing on a certain number when I play the game. The reason this happens is that the walls height of the walls between 2 numbers is small. Have a look at the attachments in this project proposal to get a better idea.What I would I like to get done is to increase the height of the walls for the American roulette wheel and European roulette wheel. I will provide the fbx file for both the wheels.The output file must be in fbx format with all materials and UV mapping.Attachments:1)	PNG file which shows the current shape of the wall between numbers in roulette wheel and the shape I want for the walls2)	Blender picture of the American wheel3)	Blender picture of the European wheelPlease give me your best quote for the project.

Easy to operate.Im open to ideas as well.Preference for Android as chrome touch screens and android tablets will be the device most popularly used.I will design the lobby screens etc in photoshop for you to use as a template.Please be reliable and quick. title: Web based app to Compile and Process CSS, JS and HTML.
desc: The problem:While generating HTML templates using frameworks like Bootstrap or Foundation, we get excellent ease and comfort, but the problem is they generate very heavy CSS and JavaScript files. I am looking for a web based application which will perform as follows:Reference for frameworks I am talking about:[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]Input will be HTML, CSS and JavaScript files in a zip format.CSS Function:1. This app must search for un-used css from the HTML and remove those entries from the CSS files.2. Combine all the CSS files into one and output a single minifies / GZip CSS file.3. Convert all the Class and ID names into short forms. Example..... like .header-image, .sidebar, #footer-section, #header-section should become something like .iao1, .iao2, #iao1, #iao2 and so on. Also generate a HTML file in table format with all the converted CSS with their new names for reference.JavaScript Functions:1. This app must search for un-used JavaScript Functions from the HTML and remove those entries from the JS files.2. Combine all the JavaScript files into one and output a single minifies / GZip JS file.HTML Function:Strip all the whitespace and compress HTMLUser Management FunctionsRather than creating a whole new user management system (which you are free to, if you insist), we can use WordPress as base and make this into a WordPress Plugin. with PayPal and PayUMoney Payment Gateway integrated. Some short-code to place BUY button at various places across the WordPress Blog Pages and Posts. With an option price-variable, tenure-variable and button-text for example:[myshortcode price="20" tenure="quarterly" button_text="Buy Quarterly"][myshortcode price="30" tenure="annually" button_text="Buy Annually"][myshortcode price="50" tenure="lifetime" button_text="Buy Lifetime"][myshortcode price="10" tenure="single_product" button_text="Buy Now"]If you do this right, then I have many such small jobs for you on a regular basis. I am trying to develop a large app with all these bits, being a part of it.I am not rigid about time frame. Take your time but do a good job.Input files will be in the form of an upload via a web-formEntire code must be very well commented explaining every row and a detailed Installation and usage documentation also must be provide. I want this to be a PHP based app.

title: Valve Status
desc: I'm interested in discussing a project that involves developing a mobile application that interacts with GIS data available in a Web Feature Service (WFS) The app would identify the attributes of specific features within the WFS and capture and display offline modifications to those attributes based on actions taken within the app. This is an example of the type of WFS is here [url removed, login to view] . An example of the app use case would be to change the attribute of a valve from open to closed based on user action within the app. The valve could be either user selected or suggested based on location of the user, i.e. nearest valve to users current location. If you have experience in pulling data from and manipulating WFS's, mobile application development and experience with GIS systems I'd like to discuss this project in further detail.

If you are not skilled in this area, please do not respond.•	Bootstrap, especially for using modals to display conditional forms, plus converting listing pages to grid systems.•	CSS3 (including mobile), html•	jQuery (especially for Ajax programming)•	Template modification•	Menu customization to add elements to the primary menu that cannot typically be controlled via dashboard theme panel.•	Plug-in programming•	Geo-code implementation•	Database operations•	Wordpress API•	Ability to work with child themes.•	Facebook API and familiarity with Facebook marketplace.•	Custom programming for adding features like mega-menu (for categories and listings)•	Chat PluginOnce the job has been awarded, we will provide a more detailed blueprint of the project. You will coordinate with our developer frequently, so please be available when needed.Name of the classified site is: [url removed, login to view]
